options.content: Benchmarking AI Factories Dashboard

elements.title: Session Duration
elements.tooltip: SLURM job time limit in minutes (5-240)

actions.confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel the service
actions.title: Cancel service

panels.title: Services & Benchmarks (click to view or cancel)

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

elements.title: ⚠️ Session not running. Please start a session first.
Model
elements.tooltip: HuggingFace model ID (type custom value if not in list)

elements.showIf: const recipe = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name").value; return recipe && recipe.includes("replicas");
elements.title: # of Replicas

elements.showIf: const recipeEl = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name"); return recipeEl && recipeEl.value && recipeEl.value.includes("replicas");
elements.title: Show Advanced
elements.tooltip: Show advanced resource configuration (nodes, CPUs, GPUs, memory)

elements.disableIf: const recipe = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name").value; return recipe && recipe.includes("single-node");
elements.showIf: const recipe = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name").value; const showAdv = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "show_advanced"); const isAdv = showAdv ? showAdv.value : false; return recipe !== "" && (!recipe.includes("replicas") || isAdv);
elements.title: # of nodes

elements.showIf: const recipe = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name").value; const showAdv = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "show_advanced"); const isAdv = showAdv ? showAdv.value : false; return recipe !== "" && (!recipe.includes("replicas") || isAdv);
elements.title: # of CPUs

elements.showIf: const recipe = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name").value; const showAdv = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "show_advanced"); const isAdv = showAdv ? showAdv.value : false; return recipe !== "" && (!recipe.includes("replicas") || isAdv);
elements.title: # of GPUs

elements.showIf: const recipe = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "recipe_name").value; const showAdv = context.panel.elements.find(el => el.id == "show_advanced"); const isAdv = showAdv ? showAdv.value : false; return recipe !== "" && (!recipe.includes("replicas") || isAdv);
elements.title: Memory

elements.title: Service ID
Req/min
elements.tooltip: Requests per minute (converted to req/s for API)

elements.title: Duration (min)
elements.tooltip: Duration of the benchmark in minutes

initial.code:
context.panel.setFormValue({
  num_clients: 10,
  requests_per_minute: 60,
  duration_minutes: 1,
  max_tokens: 10,
  temperature: 0.7,
  prompts: [
    "Write a short poem about AI.",
    "Explain what machine learning is.",
    "Tell me a fun fact about computers.",
    "What is Python programming?"
  ],
})
